translation: Know thou these to be of demonical resolves, senselessly torturing all the elements in the body and Me who dwell in the body.
commentary: 17.6 dragging torturing? dwelling in the body? Ghost Village all the elements? Unconscious senseless? Mam Me? f and? Eve even? Antasharirastham who dwells in the body within? Tan them? Viddhi know? Asuranishchayan to be of demoniac resolves.Commentary Bhutagramam The aggregate of all the elements composing the body.Elements Organs.Mam Me Vaasudeva? the witness of their thoughts and deeds.He who thus tortures Me disregards My teachings entirely.Achetasah Senseless? unintelligent? having no discrimination.
